body.name: mopio Brooklyn Mid-Century Modern Lift Top Coffee Table, Waveform Panel with Hidden Storage, Sleek Curved Profile Lift Tabletop Dining Table (Golden Oak, Coffee Table)
features: Dimension: 35.5 (W) x 19.8 (D) x 16.5 (H) Inches ; 30-Day Return with 1 Year Warranty

Design: Fabricated through a special technology, the fluted panel design is unique and elegant. The rounded corners also soften the look of the streamlined frame and provide an environment safe for little ones

Lift Top design with spring system: High quality spring mechanism enables the tabletop to be lifted or lowered down easily, smoothly and quietly, creating a decent coffee table which can double up as a workbench or dining space when sitting on the sofa
Box frame leg: Designed to distribute the weight equally across all 4 legs so you don’t have to worry about uneven legs
Space storage: Two roomy hidden compartments beneath the tabletop is enough to store your often-used items like magazines, laptop, remote controllers, game controllers, keeping them handy
Wood material: Engineered wood with laminate

Please expect color variance between actual product and photos due to different lighting conditions and online viewing device settings. Please be aware that measurements stated may vary up to 0.5 inches due to mass production, please allocate for 0.5 inches difference when measuring before purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect but complicated assembly
reviews.reviewText: I decided to replace old table I bought at resale shop many years ago, and this is the perfect choice for me. It's just as pictured; a modern look that will fit with any design. I love the storage and lift top desk features. BUT, assembly is moderately difficult and time consuming. I did it by my myself but used a drill carefully though instructions say not to. The legs were almost impossible to install because the screws would not go in all the way, even with a drill. I finally put wax on the screws, and that helped.It is heavy wood. And end result is beautiful. All the hard work was worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, took a while to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Elegant, simple, and beautiful. Love the fluted facade—perfect for any modern living spaces. Took my hubband a few hours of assemble but well worth it. We've had it for one day so we'll see how well it lasts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but a pain to build
reviews.reviewText: First, I want to begin by saying I absolutely love the aesthetic of this piece and it seems very sturdy. The lift top functions well, it does take some effort to get it up though. I love having the additional storage for controllers and such. My main gripe with this coffee table and the reason for a 4 star rating is the building process. It took two of us three hours to get this thing together, we went based off of the written directions. When we finally were about to give up I searched for a demo build of the coffee table and that was what got us to finish. I would buy again, but definitely watch a demo video on YouTube before you start building!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This coffee table is super cute but comes with major flaws. It’s super poor quality, the wood is stickers. The stickers are peeling off the sides after only 10 months of owning it. It was also a major pain to assemble. Took 3 very handy people several hours to put together. LOTS of parts and confusing instructions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice but not as functional
reviews.reviewText: I got this coffee table to match the tv stand. They look great together, but this coffee table doesn’t really meet my expectations. It is a little smaller than I thought it would be, therefore the lift top does not come up as high as I would have hoped. The lift mechanic of the table is not the best quality either. It is hard to lift up, it feels like it sticks. And setting it down, it is extremely wobbly. When putting it together, my boyfriend and I had to sand some pieces to get it all to fit together. This was unfortunate because some of the drill holes were not placed correctly so that is why we had to fix it on our own. Unfortunately I feel like I am already on the hunt for something better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, functional, fashionable-- if not a wee bit undersized
reviews.reviewText: With the help of a cordless drill assembling this medium size table only took a couple hours, with nearly no detours. The hinge is buffered for lowering and raising, and the table conceals much of the crap that used to live on the couch. It's a fashionable piece, and for its $229 price point, demonstrates its value. It is indeed veneered particle board, but who cares? Originally reluctant to purchase, this welterweight coffee table is the newest bundle of joy in our family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great table with lots of storage!
reviews.reviewText: It arrived as promised and it was pretty easy for me to assemble alone. It took me about 2 hours total. I love the updated look it provides for my living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best quality and customer service ever!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these two tables thinking that that may not be that great quality since the price it’s not that high but I was complete wrong, they are not just beautiful but the quality its something else.I had a problem with the coffee table because the box came a little bit damaged and it did something to the table, it wasn’t much but I still didn’t want to keep it like that, I contacted the vendor and they were amazing, they did not hesitate in giving me a completely new tablet and I got the new one in just 3 days.You won’t regret buying these!

I don’t understand why this table has so many great reviews. It is nice to look at, but it’s a very cheap material. Hard to put together. The instructions were not clear, and there were a few times we had to undo and put it back together. For the high price of the item and low-quality materials, this should’ve been partially put together for you.On top of that, the part that opens is wobbly and opens unevenly. Feels like a piece of junk, not a $600+ table. Waste of money, don’t do it!
